item.description:
OK all, I will be out of town for the weekend that the March meetup is scheduled.

So, I put in the polls to see what would be the most popular option for rescheduling. I will hold the poll open until February 25th. Whatever is most popular is when I will schedule the event. If there is a tie, I will flip a coin.

***Ta-da! The overwhelming response was to have the meetup on Friday, March 21.***

If this affects your plans for attending, please update your RSVP. Thanks everyone for understanding!

It looks like one of the most popular cuisine's per the polls is Thai. As a result I picked the restaurant Pakarang in Providence. Please see their website here for menu information. Bring on the spice!

Because I called so early, they have all 3 options available for our reservation, so don't forget to vote for what date works best for you! Once the date is chosen, I will work with them about dividing the bill or providing individual checks. Please see the polls again(yes, I know, but it's for your own good!) to vote on your preferred method of handling the check.

Should we fill up and you are still interested in attending, please enter a "no" RSVP and put a note stating that you want to be wait-listed. If spots open up, I will contact you in order of RSVP.

Everyone who has not attended previous events, please plan on bringing a dollar to help me defray the cost of posting on meetup. That would be such a big help to me!


Abi
item.how_to_find_us: See my picture- I'm the one with the red hair. ;-)
item.why: We are a great group of people who love to dine out!

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: The Rhode Island Dine Out Group March Meetup- PAKARANGNG- March 21
